gpes:Notification-Payload.gpes:Notification-Narrative:
To [Practice Name for A12345]
[Extraction Name]

This is to notify you that the GP Extraction Service (GPES) wishes to extract data from your clinical system within the period [date] to [date].

The data to be extracted is summarised below and is described in detail on the GPES Website
[Customer Requirement Short Description]
Your current default preference for allowing [Query Type] queries to run on your system is [preference]

Last time this query was scheduled to run you [allowed : did not allow] it to run on your system

gpes:Notification-Question.gpes:Question-Text: Please indicate whether you will allow this instance of the query to run on your system
Please also indicate whether you wish to continue receiving notifications prior to this query being run in the future
gpes:Notification-Question.gpes:Question-Post-Text: Some nice text to go here that separates it from the next question or narrative

gpes:Notification-Payload.gpes:Notification-Narrative:
If you do not respond to this notification before then the query [will : will not] be run on your system as per your [previously supplied decision : current default preference for allowing queries of this type]

Useful GPET-Q user functions: You will need your smartcard to access these on [link to GPET-Q]

"Set GP Practice Participation Defaults" allows you to change your default preference for allowing queries of various types to run on your system
"Set GP Practice Participation Decisions" allows you to set or change decisions for specific instances of specific queries. i.e. to allow them to run and / or the extracted data to be sent to the GPES customer.
